DOC.brief_summary: This first time NOX-A12 administer man . The principal aim study obtain safety tolerability data NOX-A12 administer single intravenous ( IV ) dose healthy male female subject . This information , together pharmacokinetic pharmacodynamic data , help establish dos dosage regimen administration suitable subsequent study patient population .
